blocking with the 20% wool content this blocked so nicely i soaked it in warm water with a dash of fabric softener for about a half an hour i gently squeezed out excess water then rolled it in a large beach towel and squeezed out even more water then i laid it flat to dry i didn t use any pins to block this i just let it air dry if you used an acrylic yarn you
